Name: Pisco Punch (Prosser's recipe)
Ingredients: 60 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker.
Review: Grape juice and aromatic grape-based spirit paired with pineapple and the merest hint of absinthe.
History: Jack Koeppler, the bartender at the Buena Vista Café in San Francisco who's also famous for being the first bartender in America to serve Irish Coffee , was given this recipe by the son of its creator, a fellow San Franciscan by the name of Mr Prosser. Adapted from Mr Prosser's original recipe which is said to have comprised: 2oz white grape juice, 2 oz pisco, 1 spoon pineapple juice and 1 spoon absinthe. Our Pisco Punch cocktail page gives a more detailed history of this drink and explains the different recipes.
